parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The job ID. Call [ListJobs](~~459676~~) to get the job ID.

parameters.name: MaxEventsNum
parameters.description: The maximum number of events that can be returned.

parameters.name: PodId
parameters.description: The node ID. Call [GetJob](~~459677~~) to get the node ID.

parameters.name: PodUid
parameters.description: The node UID. Call [GetJob](~~459677~~) to get the node UID.
